title: Journalist investigates school discipline disparities
content:
Scenario: Journalist investigates school discipline disparities
    Given parents report Black students face harsher discipline
    And the journalist investigates discipline practices
    When the Observer analyzes discipline data by race
    Then the journalist sees Black students suspended at 3.5x rate
    And documents same behaviors leading to suspension for Black students, warnings for white
    And tracks individual administrators with extreme disparity patterns
    And compares to districts using restorative justice successfully
    And publishes investigation exposing discriminatory discipline
    And pattern recognition reveals school-to-prison pipeline
